1.content:
The world of Pokemon, Huge, Full of life, and...you've heard this before.

Let's get to the point, there are over 800 Pokemon and many different trainers, but which Region should we travel too?

I'll leave that choice to you.
1.title: Let the Adventure Begin

11.content: Ah the original two gens, Kanto and Johto, which one would you like to travel to? Keep in mind any changes in a remake can apply?
11.title: Kanto/Johto

111.content: Kanto, the first region, where most people's adventure started. To start, who or what should become a berry?
111.title: Kanto

112.content: Johto, this is where the adventure gets better, maybe, its a matter if opinion. Who or what should become a berry?
112.title: Johto

1121.content:
Alright then, choose the trainer or human and go nuts.

(A.N. Keep in mind the age of a character, if they are technically under...lets say 15, you might need to age them up a bit)
1121.title: Human

12.content: So you wanna go to Hoenn, eh? Not a bad choice, but this isn't where the choices end. Who or what should become a berry, a Trainer/human or a Pokemon?
12.title: Hoenn (Gen. 3)

122.content:
Ok, Pokemon it is. Now, lets start the list, here's where you can start. Choose Wisely and Happy...Berrying? I don't know.

(A.N.: Please have a "Next" choice if possible so that there can be more choices)
122.title: Pokemon

1221.content: Gardevoir, the Embrace Pokémon, graceful but can be deadly when threatened. Most Gardevoirs will spend their time in a closed and silent location to raise their young and improve their Psychic abilities. But others like more open environments. But how should our story begin?
1221.title: Gardevoir (and it's previous evolutions)

12212.content: About 3 km from Fortree City, lived a family of Pokemon consisting of a Ralts, named Eve, a Kirlia, named Victoria, and a lovely Gardevoir, named Jacklin (or just Lin). They lived together in the forest, away from any trainers, and surrounded with all they could ask for, warm shelter (in the form of a large tree), plenty of food, and all the space to run around in. But their lives would soon change as another Pokemon had unknowingly planted an enhanced berry seed, it would grow berries larger then normal, faster then normal and would grow back just as fast. But those same berries would have an extra effect on those who ate more the one. (What berry?)
12212.title: A Family of Berries

122121.content:
The three sisters were laying out in an open field, watching the clouds, enjoying the sunshine and talking to each other. Little Eve was pointing out the funny looking clouds, while Victoria laughed with her, and Lin was starting to doze off. It was the middle of summer, and every Pokemon in and near Fortree City was enjoying it, especially Lin and her little sisters. But with the heat comes sweat, with sweat comes hunger, which can easily ruin a good day, but the three sisters were in luck.

Victoria got up and look around, asking, "Why didn't we bring berries with us?", Lin woke up said, "I didn't think we would need any, I was clearly mistaken." Eve got up and looked too hoping that she would find something first, but Victoria would beat her to it when she noticed a nearby stream with a large Oran Berry bush right beside it. "Perfect", Victoria ran toward the stream with Eve tailing her and Lin watching them. When Eve and Victoria reached the berry bush they noticed something odd about the Oran berries on the bush; they were twice the their normal size, they looked slightly darker, and for some unknown reason, there was a trail of berry juice leading into a hole in the ground.

They shrugged it off and started picking the berries, they managed to get half the berries off the bush when Lin joined them, "I'm sure this is enough" Lin said when they had picked 9 berries. "They look great, let's eat", and they each ate their fair share. As they ate, they got bursts of juice on their faces, they continued to talk to each other in between bites, and they even made jokes about the juice on their faces. After they finished the 9 berries, they were completely full, if not over full, they agreed to rest for a while to let the berries digest.
122121.title: Oran Berry

1221211.content:
They laid there for a good 15 minutes, letting the berries in their stomachs digest, but something extra was happening while they were sleeping. Their skin, starting at their stomachs, was slowly turning blue, and slowly spread throughout their bodies. It made its way up their necks, reaching their faces, turning their eyes blue under their eyelids, and their hair blue as well. Once they almost turned completely blue, the three of them woke up, not noticing their changes. "Well, that felt good" Victoria said while stretching, "Yes, I feel refreshed and...uh", Lin noticed that Victoria was blue from head to the middle of her lower legs, Eve also saw this and spoke up. "Victoria...you're blue."

Victoria looked down and saw what they meant, she was almost completely blue, her feet were the last to go. She looked at her sisters and noticed that, they too were blue. They look at themselves and confirmed that there wasn't a single bit of them left that wasn't blue, and they even noticed that the juice that was on their faces had absorbed into their skin. Lin looked at her panicking sisters and said, "Ok, lets just stop and try to think about how we can fix this". But that would soon be futile as a strong gurgling came from their individual stomachs and they felt a sudden fullness.
1221211.title: They start turning blue

12212111.content: They looked at each other in concern, hoping one for them could give an answer for what's happening. The feeling for fullness grew stronger and stronger, until their bellies started to bulge out, the three of them grabbed their growing guts in fear. "Wha...What?" Lin said watching her ever growing belly. Victoria gave her belly a shake and felt and even heard a slight sloshing, she gave a look of both fear and confusion, but it was going to get worse as she felt the full feeling moving down to her butt, causing it to grow as well. She placed a hand on her butt and felt it grow in her hand, she turned to tell Lin, but she saw that Lin was having the same problem. Lin was having another problem, the full feeling also moved to her chest, causing her to develope breasts, Lin was surprised but also concerned. She hesitantly reached for one of her growing breasts and gave it a light squeeze, she blushed hard, and let out a slight moan. Little Eve was kinda enjoying her transformation, she was playing with her growing belly and even tried to bounce on it, but no luck, but she still enjoyed laying on her growing belly.
12212111.title: Juicy Part Please

122121112.content:
They continued to grow for about 10 minutes, and they showed no sign of stopping, Lin had grown to about 10 feet in diameter and her new bust had become 3 feet in diameter, Victoria had grown to 7 feet in diameter and her skirt had flopped down to her sides, and Eve had grown to 5 feet in diameter and was rocking back and forward. All of their cheeks had swelled up with juice, making their speech muffled, and juice was coming out of their mouths. Their arms and legs had sank into their bodies leaving only their hands, feet and head sticking out.

Lin was feeling very uncomfortable, her breasts were very sensitive and felt like they were going to leak, Victoria was conflicted, she couldn't move, but the feeling for being full was actually kinda nice, as for Eve, she was having the time of her life. They were still growing but after a few minutes, they started to slow down. Lin stopped at 15 feet with 5 feet breasts, Victoria stopped at 10 feet, and Eve stopped at 7 feet. While Eve was having fun rolling around, and Victoria was just trying to process what happened to them, Lin was trying to hold back the juice that was trying to force itself out of her breasts.

122122.content:
Lin and her sisters were just strolling through the forest, talking and laughing together, when Victoria suddenly spotted something in the distance. "Hey, look over there" Lin and Eve looked where she was pointing and say something green and pink, Lin picked up Eve and they made their way toward what Victoria saw.

Once they got to the clearing they feasted their eyes on a sight that made Eve drool, Victoria smile so big, and Lin stare an awe. It was a Watmel Berry over a meter in diameter "Lin...I think I know what we're having for dinner" Lin nodded in agreement. "Ok but I'm going to need the two of you to help me bring this thing home" Victoria and Eve nodded and they all focused their psychic powers on lifting the huge berry.

After what felt like forever they got the berry home and were ready to feast on it. "I don't think we'll have to worry about food if this is the kind of berries we find." Victoria said proudly. And with that they begain sinking into their dinner, after nearly 30 minutes, they actually ate the whole berry. Lin ate half, Victoria ate a third and Eve ate the rest.

All three Pokemon were pretty much overfilled, and it showed. Their bellies stuck straight out in front of them and none had the energy to move. "Oof, well, that was the best thing I've ever tasted, you two agree?" Victoria and Eve nodded rubbing their swollen middles. "I think I need to sleep this off, I'm...so full" Victoria said, struggling to get up with the weight of her gut. "Yeah...lets...get to...bed" Lin said doing the same, Eve had passed out on the spot so Lin had to lift her up with her psychic lift.
122122.title: Watmel Berry

choices: Their transformation was now truly beginning
1221221.content:
As the sun rose in the sky, Lin slowly opened her eyes and sat up to rub her eyes. She made her way to her sister's room to wake them up, she took a quick look at her self and in her blurry vision she saw that her belly was sticking out a little bit. "Damn it, I'm going to have to work this off, maybe a nice hike toward that berry tree we found yesterday.

Once she entered her sister's room she noticed something odd about them, but she just shook it off thinking it was just her being tired. She got ready to walk toward the berry tree they found the other day, she needed to get some exercise and maybe get another berry, but this time use it for the whole day. But, once she stepped outside, the sun shined in her eyes, she blocked the sun with her hand. When she did so, she saw that her hand was a different color, it was light green and pink striped. She looked down and saw that the rest of her body was the same, she ran toward the lake near by and saw that her face had the same pattern and her eyes had turned pink.

She ran to her sisters, who were up and had too noticed what had happened to them. "Victoria, Eve, lets step outside and see if we can figure this out". They all walk out into the clearing in front of their home and tried to stay calm, but their calmness would soon be interrupted by a loud gurgling.
1221221.title: What was in that Berry?

choices: Yes, someone finds them and does something to them.
No, this is how it ends.
12212211.content:
Lin looked down shocked, feeling a strong full feeling in her stomach getting stronger and stronger. She placed a hand on her belly and to her horror see felt her once (mostly) flat belly had began to bulge out at a slow rate, looking up she saw that Victoria and Eve were suffering the same fate. They continued to expand, soon their expansion spread to Lin's breasts, Lin and Victoria's butts and their arms and legs (or what ever a Ralt's legs are considered). Victoria placed a hand on her butt and pressed against it a bit, feeling it sink, Lin grabbed one of her breasts and gave it a small shake, to her disbelief, she felt a liquid sloshing around and she even heard the sloshing.

"Lin...I think we're filling with juice" "What makes you think its juice?" Lin said grabbing still growing belly, "I remember hearing a story about how a human ate a berry that was larger then normal and she turned into a berry, I think we're turning in to Watmel Berries". Lin's jaw hit the floor (or her belly) when she heard that statement.

After 20 minutes, Lin, Victoria, and Eve had just about reached their maximum capacity and had become round like a Watmel Berry, Lin had reached 50 feet in diameter and her breasts had become 3 times the size of her head, Victoria had reached 25 feet in diameter and her skirt had shrunk making it flat against her now large, round form, and Eve had reached 10 feet in diameter, she was confused but also having fun with her new form. All three Pokemon's arms and legs had sunk into their bodies and their cheeks filled with juice making them swell up and making their speech muffled.

Lin thought to herself 'Could this get worse then it already is?'
12212211.title: A Juicy Transformation

13.content:
Ah, so you wish to visit either Sinnoh or Unova, both quite nice places, but which one in particular?

131.content: Sinnoh, a place full of Contests, Poffen making and most of all, Pokemon, but should we have a trainer or a Pokemon become a berry?
131.title: Sinnoh

1311.content: Ok, here are a couple Pokemon for you to start with, Have fun and be sure to make 'em big.

13111.content: Lopunny, the Bunny Pokemon and a Pokemon that some how looks similar to the playboy bunny logo...okay. Anyway, choose a berry and go nuts.
13111.title: Lopunny (and Buneary)

131112.content: Wepear Berry, a somewhat sour berry that promotes digestion, and this small berry will have a big effect on our target. Choose a Story start.
131112.title: Wepear Berry

choices: It warms up enough to scavege
Wepear Berries show up at their doorstep...or borrow entrance?
1311122.content:
It was a cold winter's evening in the Sinnoh region, two Pokemon, a nearly full grown Lopunny named Lilly and a young Buneary named Haily, were in a borrow in a forest. They had a small fire between them, Lilly thankfully knew Fire Punch which she used to light the pile of sticks they managed to grab nearby. Haily spoke up and said, "Sis, are you sure we'll make it through winter? I don't think we have enough food or fire wood." Lilly looked at her sister and smiled, "Don't worry, we'll make it through, I think tomorrow will be a bit less cold, we can look for food and wood then." Haily smiled back and nodded, Lilly used Fire Punch on what was left of their fire wood and both went to sleep.

(What Happens the Next Day?)
1311122.title: Lopunny and Buneary (sisters)

13111221.content:
The next morning, Lilly woke up and saw the sun light shining bright, she went to the entrance to their home and saw that the wind was gone, it wasn't has cold and she could see berries a few feet from them, specifically, Wepear Berries, fully ripe and...her stomach growled. "Well, looks like I'm going to get some breakfast before Haily even wakes up." She quietly stepped out grabbed a large leaf and began picking the green berries off their bush, but something was off. When she was finished her picking she closed the leaf up and went to pick it up but she found it to be quite heavier then she was used to.

She lugged the heavy "bag" of berries home and placed them down, the sudden thud waking Haily. "Sis what is that?" Lilly looked at her with a bit of concern but more joy. "I got some food, it was a bit more heavy but maybe they're just frozen." Haily took one and gave it a squeeze, she didn't feel any thing hard, it was actually pretty soft. "Well, if you got the food then I'll get the wood, I want to do my part, be right back Lilly." With that she hopped off to get the wood, while Lilly sat down and began munching down on a berry. After 10 minutes, she had finished the one berry and went to grab another and bit into it.

(What happens next?)
13111221.title: It warms up enough to scavege

131112211.content:
Lilly had eaten 3 berries and was full, she sat there rubbing her full belly. "Ahh, that was great, maybe I should get more after this stash is finished." What she didn't see was that her fur had started turning a dark green starting at her belly, she had closed her eyes to rest all the while her fur continued to turn green. Haily returned with a whole stack of sticks to make a fire with, "Hey Lilly, I'm back, and I brought a lot of...Green?" Lilly looked at her little sister in confusion, "Green...what?" Haily put the wood down and looked at her sister with concern, "Sis, did you get berry juice on your fur?" "Huh...what do you...mean?" She looked at her body and saw that her fur had completely turned a tint of green, her sister even pointed out that her eyes had also turned green.

"How...How did this happen?" Lilly looked at herself even further, noticing that every part of her had become green. "I think it has something to do with those berries, you mentioned they were heavier then usual, and they were pretty soft, not sure if that has anything to do wi-" Before she could finish her thought a loud gurgle came from Lilly, who was still in shock at her current condition.

(Choose you expansion path)
131112211.title: Her skin turns green

Lilly stopped looking at herself and looked straight at Haily, she started hearing the gurgling too, but it was only getting worse, as she felt a sudden fullness in her thighs. 141.content:
OK, trainers/humans will be our focus, here are a few choices to start, be sure to make 'em big.

(A.N. Keep in mind the age of a character, if they are technically under...lets say 15, you might need to age them up a bit)
141.title: Human

choices: A piece of gum from a rival
1411.content:
Serena, a Pokemon Showcase Trainer, she had entered the Master Class and was planning on entering the Final Show Case of the Year to prove she's the true Kalos Queen.

Little did she know, something would get in her way and transform not only her body but mind as well.
1411.title: Serena

14111.content:
Serena had traveled a good distance toward the Newest Pokemon Showcase, this final one will allow Serena to prove, she can be the next Kalos Queen, but she wasn't the only one with that dream.

Her friends had worked just as hard and were going to the same Showcase. But who would be the one to give Serena the gum?
14111.title: Biting off more then you can chew

141112.content:
Miette was a Pokemon Performer, just like Serena, but they didn't exactly, like each other, they were practically competitive every time they entered the same competition. But this time, Miette had a plan to make sure she would win, making sure Serena never makes it to the competition in the first place.

She created a disguise to give Serena a pack of gum, but with a twist, the gum was laced with a special formula that would stop her in her tracks and guarantee that she would never want to become Kalos Queen but instead want to stay something else.

(Choose a Berry)
141112.title: When your Rival is a Poor Sport

choices: Have it require more then one gumball
1411121.content:
Miette had the whole plan set up, now all she had to do was give Serena the gum without out her being revealed. She made her way to the exit to the forest that Serena was going to come out of and placed her trap, a small bag tied to a balloon with a note. She hid in the bushes and waited for her target and kept her eyes on the time, she needed to be well rested for tomorrows performance practice, the full performance was in 3 days and she needed to make sure that Serena doesn't make it there.

After 15 minutes of waiting, Serena finally showed up, smiling her signature smile and walking with her Braixen beside her. This was Miette's chance, she quickly shot a stone at the balloon which caused the bag to fall right in front of Serena. She looked at the bag and read the note which said "Dearest Serena, I hope this bag of Magost Berry gum makes it to you in time, this should help with your training and maybe even bring you good luck for your performance".

Serena was confused as to why the gum just fell out of nowhere but she just shrugged it off and opened the bag, what she saw were vibrant pink gumballs. She picked one out and popped it into her mouth, she immediately tasted intense sweetness and delight. "Wow, these taste great, though I wonder who wanted to give them to me...well, if I find out, then I'll be sure to thank them."

Little did she know, things were about to get interesting.
1411121.title: Magost Berry

14111211.content:
Serena was walking down the road and chewing the piece of gum for a good 10 minutes, but something was changing her skin. Her cheek where she was chewing the gum had started to turn a dark pink and started to spread across her face making her eyes pink and her hair a leafy green. After another 10 minutes of Serena walking and chewing she suddenly stopped in her tracks and her Braixen followed suit but when it looked up at its trainer, its eyes widened and jaw dropped, Serena was completely pink from head to toe with the exception of her hair, which was green and her clothes which were untouched. And it was only going to get worse from there.

Serena placed a hand on her belly, she had began to feel extremely bloated and the feeling was getting worse. She looked down and saw that she had turned a dark pink and her hair had become the color of leaves. She began to panic, she looked at herself for a bit, but her attention was brought back to her belly when she saw it starting to bulge out.

She place her hand on her now growing belly and tried to push it back but to no avail, it just kept growing. When she tried to run she felt something sloshing in her stomach, a liquid. Soon after, she felt a full feeling in her chest and she immediately knew what was going to happen, her breasts started to fill up with the unknown liquid that was also in her belly, and was growing fast. She grabbed one of them and gave them a light shake, she felt the liquid sloshing, she knew there was no going back, she just stood there letting her body grow.

After 20 minutes, Serena was still growing and growing fast, her dress had ripped apart, the stocking were hanging on but nearly at their limits, and her boots had popped off, she was just standing there in her bra and panties, and she had given her hat to Braixen. Serena had become nearly rotund, her arms and legs had thickened, her belly, butt and breasts had grown tenfold, and her cheeks had swollen up, making her speech muffled.

Serena felt her growing form, thinking when it would end, but she just hoped it would end soon. See closed her eyes and tried to think happy thoughts, but her thoughts of performing and Ash, had turned into thoughts of ecstasy and juice.

When she opened her eyes, she looked down and saw that she had become a pink, round, juice ball, and she suddenly wanted more. She had grown to a diameter of 8 feet and her breast had become 3 feet in diameter, her head, hands and feet were sticking out, but she wanted to be bigger, her mind had change almost completely.

15.title: Alola

151.content: Alright, here's a few trainers for you to choose from to start. Choose wisely and make 'em Big.
151.title: Human

1511.content: Lillie it is, my personal fav. She is quite the beautiful girl and she may have a slight fear of Pokemon, but she loves them in her heart. But she might have to get over her fear, because Pokemon are going to be all around her.
1511.title: Lillie

choices: Snowy finds an unusual looking one
15111.content: Yache Berry, this Berry has a refreshing flavor that strikes a good balance of dryness and sourness. It tastes better chilled. Seeing how she has an Alolan Vulpix named Snowy, this may fit. But how should she become a Yache Berry (or similar)
15111.title: Yache Berry

choices: They agree to try them together
They agree to do it later, but Lillie tries it alone
They agree to try them together, but after they get some air
151112.content:
It was a clear sunny day on Melemele Island, and the Pokemon School was just finishing for the day. All the boys were heading home, while the girls stayed behind, Mallow had found something that she wanted to share, especially with Lillie, 3 packs of Yache Berry Gum.

Prof. Kukui said his goodbyes and left the 3 girls in the classroom, Mallow spun around to face her two friends. "Now that we're alone, I wanna show you something cool, I found it in a store yesterday for next to nothing." Lillie looked at Lana in confusion but also interest. Lana spoke up "What is it, some kind of rare fruit? A Pokemon Toy? Some Cool Shades?" Mallow responded, "I wish, nope and you really think I use those?" She took out the packs of gum, "I saw these and thought the 3 of us could try them together, what do you say?"
151112.title: Yache Berry Gum

1511121.content:
Lillie and Lana nod in agreement, Mallow hands them a pack each and they open their own packs. Each pack has 5 sticks, and they each took one out, "Ok, ready?" Mallow readies the gum as did Lillie and Lana, "On three, one...two...THREE" and with that they each put a stick of gum into their mouth and began chewing.

They immediately got a burst of juicy flavor, Lillie was the first to speak their reaction, "Wow, it tastes great, what is it though?" "Yache Berry" Mallow answers. Lana was enjoying her gum as well, but she was so into it she didn't bother speaking, and she would continue being like that for a while. After 10 minutes the gum had lost its flavor much to the girl's dismay, but Mallow tried to cheer them up, while swallowing her gum in the process, the others did the same.

"Snowy, whats up, you want some atten-" before she finished her question, she noticed the blue spot Snowy was trying to lick off and watched as it spread across her hand and arm. She turned to Mallow and Lana only to find that Mallow's legs and Lana's face were also turning blue and the blue was spreading, they looked at each other in both disbelief and fear.

"What is happening?" Lillie said while watching the blue spread down her arm towards her shoulder, "I'm not sure why this is happening, but it's not good" Mallow said as her whole left leg turned blue and her right started turning blue. Lana told Popplio to create a small bubble to see her reflection and saw that her eyes had turned a dark blue and her hair was doing the same. The blue continued to spread on all three girls, turning their eyes and hair a dark blue, covering them from head to toe.

But this was only the start as once the were completely blue, with the exception of their clothes, their problems were going to get worse. "Mallow...where did you get that gum" Lillie said with concern in her voice, "I found it in a small store, there was only 3 packs left" Mallow answered.
But before anyone else could speak, their stomachs started gurgling, the sound got louder by the minute.

choices: Their Pokemon help them get bigger
Their Pokemon go and get help

Lillie looked down and grabbed her stomach, the others followed suit. "What's happening now?" Mallow said, she soon got her answer as her belly, butt and thighs started filling with juice, Lillie and Lana soon suffered the same fate, the 3 continued to expand. Their bodies filled up with juice at a gradual rate, their arms and legs soon began sinking into their still filling bodies, their cheeks filled with juice making speech muffled, and Lillie and Mallow even started growing breasts which were also filling with juice.

info.brief_description: Make one or more of the many feminine and/or female characters of Pokemon into Berries.
info.description:
Rules:
-Try to keep the expansion to Pokemon Berries
-The character you chose needs to a part of the expansion, however others can also be a part of it.
-Females only please (But males can be the cause or a witness)
-Try to gradually have the character(s) expand, be at least a bit descriptive, don't be vague.
-Keep the sexual stuff to a minimum (nudity and releasing the juice through vag. is allowed but keep the latter brief)
-Keep toilet stuff to a minimum (of...none)
-If the Pokemon you wish to expand is normally gender-less, as long as you refer to them as feminine (or gender-neutral if wanted) then go nuts.
-The shape of the expansion can vary (ex. Oran Berry is round but a Iapapa Berry is more bottom heavy), but if the berry is not round, the expansion can still be.
-Unless you are extending the character roster, make sure your chapter is at least 3-4 sentences long.

Any chapter that doesn't meet these rules will be removed, UNLESS, you PM me asking for an exception, but you must have a good reason.

If there are any questions, PM me and I will answer them.
